text: Ricardo Chávez Soto (born November 19, 1994 in Ciudad Victoria, Tamaulipas) is a Mexican professional footballer who currently plays for Liga MX club Necaxa. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Tigres UANL footballers Category:Correcaminos UAT footballers Category:Cimarrones de Sonora players Category:FC Juárez footballers Category:Club Necaxa footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Liga Premier de México players Category:Tercera División de México players Category:Footballers from Tamaulipas Category:People from Ciudad Victoria
title: Ricardo Chávez Soto
